participant_1.background:
My favorite place to eat is my local sushi bar because I love trying new things and their sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
i love to go shopping.
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
i love art museums.

content.text: Not much, just trying to find some inspiration for my next project.
I'm a graphic designer, so I'm always looking for new ways to create something beautiful.
That's cool, I like to take pictures.
Oh cool! What kind of pictures do you take?
I like to take pictures of nature and my friends.
That's awesome! I love taking pictures of nature too.
Have you ever been to an art museum?
Yeah, I love going to art museums!
Me too! I love seeing all the different kinds of art.
What's your favorite kind of art?
I like all kinds of art, but I really love abstract art.
Me too! I love the way it can be interpreted in so many different ways.
